entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
